data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Sabana Grande to agree with you and with one another.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sabana Grande, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 7,088 believers in Sabana Grande to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 7,088 believers living in the state of Sabana Grande. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Sabana Grande, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Sabana Grande
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Sabana Grande, Sabana Grande, Puerto Rico.
Father, we pray that the state of Sabana Grande be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Sabana Grande, Puerto Rico a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Sabana Grande, Puerto Rico has a population of 21,800.

We estimate Sabana Grande has 7,088 people who might know Jesus, 13,524 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,189 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 14,713 lost in Sabana Grande that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light
